item.title: Graphix cup?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“poor noob, post:27, topic:64684”]First of all when i said people should make one topic with all their work on it, i meant for those people who are taking it out of hand.

And as for this off topic thing, you were replying to my post so any person would think its directed towards them.

Then the Graphics cup, I have no problem with it but the whole idea is just wrong. Why would anyone want this cup to show that they are good at graphics? Do you need proof that you are good and you have this cup because of it.
If they did make a cup it should be given to people who are helpful with other people who have graphic questions and who make quality banners sigs or ads etc. Not to people who are good at graphics.

If you read what other people where saying they meant for thing cup to be given to people with good graphic skills, but to me thats not what matters at all.[/quote]

Why would anyone want a SCAR cup to show they are good at SCAR…

Re-read your post. You contradict yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Graphix cup?
item.dc:creator: @poor_noob poor noob
item.description:
@poor_noob wrote:

First of all when i said people should make one topic with all their work on it, i meant for those people who are taking it out of hand.

And as for this off topic thing, you were replying to my post so any person would think its directed towards them.

Then the Graphics cup, I have no problem with it but the whole idea is just wrong. Why would anyone want this cup to show that they are good at graphics? Do you need proof that you are good and you have this cup because of it.
If they did make a cup it should be given to people who are helpful with other people who have graphic questions and who make quality banners sigs or ads etc. Not to people who are good at graphics.

If you read what other people where saying they meant for thing cup to be given to people with good graphic skills, but to me thats not what matters at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Graphix cup?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“poor noob, post:25, topic:64684”]I know what i am posting. Your just asking me to keep the post on topic and who are you to say that. Your acting like a mod and your are not and it pissed me off.

I will do what i want.
[br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2007, 04:32:48 PM[/size][hr]And most of my posts are in the Graphics section, but look at it what it’s turning into. I think if people are posting their work it should be all on one post, not 10 different posts of each person showing everything they made.[/quote]

Firstly, I wasn’t tell YOU to keep on topic, I was telling everyone. What’s the point of making a specific topic, if you aren’t actually going to stick to it?

Your acting like you know best and you know the rules. When, in actualy fact, you are breaking the rules. I am simple instructing you, and everyone else not to.

Why should people stick to one topic? Ok, some people are taking it out of hand and making a new one every hour, but that isn’t to say that everyone should stick to one topic.

Also, what has having more topics got to do with a Graphics cup. In case you didn’t notice, that’s the actual TOPIC of this post which everyone should stick to and not go OFFTOPIC. If your going to whine like a little bitch that I simply told people not to go off topic, then frankly, I don’t want to be having this discussion with you.

As you can see from more previous post, I demolished your argument about why we shouldn’t have cups. What dis advantage is there to having a graphics cup? None. None what-so-ever. I’ll keep believing that until you can argue, civilley, with me with a valid argument.

Read full topic

[br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2007, 04:32:48 PM[/size][hr]And most of my posts are in the Graphics section, but look at it what it’s turning into. I think if people are posting their work it should be all on one post, not 10 different posts of each person showing everything they made.

item.title: Graphix cup?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Well, actually, according to the stats, the Graphics board is, on paper, the 10th most popular board on Mopar. So, yes, A LOT of people would moan and whine of this section disappeared. SCAR isn’t in the top 10, yet we have awards for SCAR scripting, so why not a Graphics cup.

Every cup is useless, it just shows that your good at SCAR/Java/Delphi ect.

Also:

lol It doesn't matter anyways, not like your a mod

I take it that is some sort of slur on my part. FYI, I asked to be de-modded from this section. + What does me not being a mod have to do with keeping a post on topic. Seriously, think about what you are posting before pressing the button.

Read full topic
